       ****sample code to read nogaps info data *********
      read(10,'(a80)')
      read(10,'(4i10)') numlons,numlats,numlevs,numlxy
      read(10,'(a80)')
      read(10,'(i5,2f20.15)') (kx,asig(k),bsig(k),k=1,numlevs+1)
      read(10,'(a80)')
      read(10,'(i5,5x,f20.15,i6)') (jx,alat(j),lix(j),j=1,numlats)
